er and throws a straight punch, aiming for Stiller's left eye...

ce...)

ce Omega

y, July 12, 2001 7:02 PM

            Arrow ducks the palm and steps right into Termit=
ron's shots meant for Stiller. He's hit by them in the back and goes down t=
o one knee.

            Burning Hammer stares at Perplex is stasis lock wh=
ile everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He shakes his head...
